name: LightSlinger Heroes
summary: Unique Strategy RPG + Puzzle Shooter! STRATEGIZE... AIM... FIRE! Shoot and match orbs to attack or defend your realm, in this fast-paced twist on Puzzle RPGs. Assemble your ultimate team from dozens of unique heroes, each with tactical spells that turn the tide of battles! Test your skills and strategy as you battle past powerful bosses en route to the Dragon Kirin’s foreboding sanctuary....
